P1319 压缩技术

Written on December 29th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,used=0,ans=0;
	bool num=0;
	cin>>n;
	while(cin)
	{
		int x;
		cin>>x;
		for(int i=1;i<=x;i++)
		{
			if(used<n-1)
			{
				cout<<num;
				used++;
			}
			else 
			{
				cout<<num<<endl;
				used=0; 
				ans++;
			}	
		}
		if(num==0)
			num=1;
		else
			num=0;
		if(ans==n)
			return 0;
	}
	return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
